subject: Basketball (College)
Television
NCAA Basketball Championships (Men)
lead_paragraph: Bill Raftery, who has called the Final Four on radio since the early 1990s, is a rare sportscaster to wait until 70 or older to reach a television pinnacle.
snippet: Bill Raftery, who has called the Final Four on radio since the early 1990s, is a rare sportscaster to wait until 70 or older to reach a television pinnacle.
